summary:
Otorhinolaryngology, often called ENT (Ear, Nose, and Throat), is a medical specialty. Doctors who specialize in this field treat problems in the head and neck area. These issues might affect your senses, like hearing and smell, or activities like breathing and swallowing. They also deal with cancers and tumors in this region.

ENT doctors use various tools and techniques, including lasers, to perform surgeries. For example, a 40-watt CO2 laser is used for delicate procedures in the throat, nose, and ear hospital. This specialty has a long history, with the Royal National Throat, Nose and Ear Hospital in London dating back to 1874.
title: Otorhinolaryngology
